Responsibilities: Responsibilities of Customer Service and Sales Executives:
- Outbound and inbound call management: Making calls to potential customers and receiving calls from interested customers.
- Providing product and service information: Clearly and professionally explaining the company's products and services to customers.
- Lead follow-up and sales conversion: Maintaining regular communication with potential leads and converting them into permanent customers.
- Data management and reporting: Updating daily work tasks and accurately storing customer information on Google Sheets or CRM.
- Providing answers to inquiries: Resolving any customer questions or doubts and assisting with accurate information.
- Achieving sales targets: Meeting the company's defined daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets.
- Maintaining customer support and relationships: Ensuring post-sales services are provided and building long-term business relationships.
- Team coordination: Coordinating with other departments for the smooth running of tasks.
- Participation in training: Attending regular training sessions to learn about products, services, and sales skills.

Courier and Delivery Management:
- Order processing and booking: Booking orders correctly on the courier portal after ensuring customer's order confirmation.
- Delivery tracking: Tracking the current location of the parcel in transit and providing regular updates to the customer.
- Return or parcel follow-up: Resolving any delivery issues or non-receipt of parcels by contacting the courier service and the customer.
- Cash on delivery (COD) coordination: Managing payment received from the courier and promptly resolving any payment-related issues.
- Parcel packing supervision: Ensuring products are packed correctly and sent through the appropriate courier service.

Requirements: Essential Qualifications and Skills (Requirements): HSC/Equivalent pass. Prior experience in tele sales or call center-related work preferred. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong mentality and self-confidence to achieve sales targets. Customer-centric attitude and problem-solving skills. Ability to learn quickly and work under pressure. Additional Skills (Good to Have): Presentation Skills. Problem-Solving Skills. Negotiation Skills. Time management and multitasking abilities. Proficiency in computer and CRM software usage. Experience in customer management through email and social media. Preference given to candidates with proficiency in communication in Bengali and English alongside other languages.

Responsibilities: An educated, online and computer savvy employee is needed as an office assistant in a college. Job Responsibilities: Work Hours: * 6 days a week (except Fridays). * From 4:00 PM to 9:00 PM daily. Salary: Monthly 6000/- (six thousand) taka. Responsibilities: * Assist in daily office work. * Collect student fees. * Provide various information to students over the phone. * Ensure proper completion of all admission-related activities. * Gather and maintain all necessary information for audits. * Inform teachers of the college's class schedule (over the phone). * Provide answers to various questions on all online pages. * Work as a principle executive in the overall management of the college. * Create skills for following and increasing followers and members on various social media platforms, content creation, establishing communication with customers, and conducting online presence management through effectiveness analysis. * Run promotions on social media. * Create promotional banners and short video clips. Leave: * The college will be closed on all general government holidays. * Other existing holidays in educational institutions can be enjoyed normally. Special Condition: * Selected candidates must commit to working in this institution for a minimum of three years. Application Process: * Interested and qualified candidates must send their CV online. (Under no circumstances should you call, contact will be made if the CV is found suitable) Note: Female candidates can apply

company_address: Jigatola,Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: - Collect blood samples safely (as per clinic protocol) and label samples correctly.
- Perform routine laboratory tests: CBC, biochemistry and other in-house tests as required.
- Operate lab equipment/analyzers (as available in the clinic) and ensure proper handling.
- Maintain cleanliness and biosafety of lab area; follow infection control and waste disposal rules.
- Prepare slides/smears (when needed) and assist in basic microscopic examination under supervision.
- Record test details properly and report results to the doctor/management on time.
- Store reagents/kits properly, monitor expiry dates, and maintain basic inventory.
- Assist with QC/maintenance tasks (daily cleaning, calibration support, logbook updates).
- Support the clinic team during busy hours and handle tasks responsibly.

Requirements: Education Diploma in Medical Technology (Laboratory) preferred (Candidates with relevant science background and lab experience may also apply.) Experience 0тАУ2 years experience in a diagnostic lab/veterinary clinic is preferred. Freshers can apply if confident to learn and work responsibly. Skills & Knowledge Basic knowledge of blood sample collection , labeling, and safe handling. Ability to operate CBC/biochemistry analyzers (training will be provided if needed). Understanding of biosafety, infection control, and waste disposal procedures. Basic computer skills for record keeping/report entry. Personal Requirements Honest, punctual, and responsible. Good communication and teamwork attitude. Willing to work 9 hours daily and handle workload during busy hours. Education Qualifications Diploma in Medical Technology (Laboratory) preferred (Candidates with relevant science background and lab experience may also apply.) Experience 0-2 years of experience in a diagnostic lab/veterinary clinic is preferred. Freshers can also apply - if eager to learn and responsible. Skills Basic understanding of blood sample collection , labeling, and safe handling. Ability to operate CBC/biochemistry analyzers (training will be provided if necessary). Knowledge of biosafety, infection control, and waste disposal procedures. Basic computer skills for record keeping/report entry. Personal Qualities Honest, punctual, and responsible. Good communication and teamwork skills. Mentally prepared to work 9 hours daily and manage workload during busy times.

Responsibilities: Are you hardworking? Do you want to eliminate unemployment? Then an extraordinary opportunity awaits you!

With over 155 years of experience, operating in more than 40 countries worldwide, and holding a prominent position in Bangladesh for over 70 years, American financial organization MetLife offers a golden opportunity to build a career as a Financial Associate.

- Regularly following up with existing customers and ensuring their satisfaction
- Providing correct guidance on financial security and investment plans for customers
- Achieving monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets
- Managing marketing activities to enhance brand value
- Building long-term relationships with customers and providing financial solutions for their families
- Actively participating in company training, workshops, and developmental programs

Apply now!

Responsibilities: We are looking for a skilled Web Developer (Laravel) with a minimum of 2 years of professional experience in developing robust, scalable web applications. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance backend and web solutions using the Laravel framework, ensuring smooth integration with frontend components, databases, and third-party services.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop, maintain, and optimize web applications using the Laravel (PHP) framework.
- Write clean, secure, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and Laravel standards.
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers, product managers, and frontend developers to implement new features.
- Design and integrate RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications.
- Ensure application performance, security, scalability, and reliability.
- Work with databases such as MySQL / PostgreSQL, including query optimization.
- Debug, troubleshoot, and fix application issues; continuously improve system performance.
- Implement authentication, authorization, and role-based access control.
- Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain coding standards.
- Stay up to date with the latest Laravel, PHP, and web development trends.

- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computing & Information System
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Engineering
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computing & Information System

- Overseeing the complete administrative and operational responsibilities of the outlet

company_address: House-1/B, Road-2/1, Block-J, Baridhara, Dhaka-1212.
job_description:
Responsibilities: We are a leading manpower recruitment agency looking for a dynamic, energetic, and self-motivated Female Executive to join our team. If you have excellent communication skills and a knack for digital marketing, we want to hear from you!

Requirements: Key responsibilities and deliverables
- Manage end-to-end customer interactions across channels: handle inbound and outbound calls, social media messages, and direct inquiries; follow up promptly to convert leads and resolve issues.
- Develop, implement and maintain a content calendar for social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn), including post concepts, captions, visuals, and publishing schedule.
- Execute community management: respond to comments, moderate conversations, escalate complaints, and maintain a positive brand voice online.
- Support digital campaign setup and monitoring: assist with organic campaigns, coordinate with paid advertising teams, prepare ad copy suggestions, and track basic campaign metrics.
- Maintain accurate records in CRM or lead-tracking tools: log conversations, update lead status, set reminders, and produce basic follow-up reports.
- Collaborate with internal teams (sales, recruitment, creative) to align messaging, share feedback from customers, and refine lead nurturing strategies.
- Contribute to performance improvement by suggesting A/B tests for posts/ads, refining targeting, and documenting what content formats drive the best engagement.

Required technical skills
- Social media management: hands-on experience publishing posts, scheduling content, and monitoring engagement across major platforms (examples: Facebook Business Suite, Creator Studio, Instagram tools).
- Content creation basics: ability to write clear, audience-appropriate captions and produce simple visual assets (examples: Canva, basic image editing); knowledge of post format best practices for engagement.
- Analytics and reporting: familiarity with basic metrics (reach, impressions, engagement rate, click-through, conversion indicators) and ability to compile simple weekly performance summaries using spreadsheets or dashboards.
- CRM and lead management: experience with lead logging, follow-up workflows, and simple segmentation (examples: HubSpot, Zoho, Google Sheets-based trackers).
- Digital communication tools: comfortable using email, chat platforms, video calls, and phone systems; ability to maintain professional written and verbal records of interactions.
- Basic technical literacy: comfortable learning new SaaS tools, troubleshooting common issues (login, permissions, media upload), and following step-by-step platform guides.
- Lead response time and follow-up completion rate.
- Engagement metrics for social content (likes, comments, shares, saves) and follower growth trends.

company_address: 5/33, Gulistan Shopping Complex, Gulistan, Dhaka.
job_description:
Responsibilities: - Greet customers warmly, listen to their needs, and recommend appropriate mobile displays, gadgets, and accessories.
- Drive retail and wholesale sales by demonstrating product features, explaining benefits, and suggesting complementary items.
- Process orders accuratelyтАФaccept customer orders, confirm specifications, enter details, and ensure timely preparation for pickup or delivery.
- Coordinate with procurement and logistics to schedule, track, and confirm deliveries, proactively resolving fulfillment issues.
- Handle point-of-sale transactions, returns, and exchanges efficiently while maintaining a positive and professional customer experience.
- Maintain attractive, well-organized showroom displays and manage stock levels through regular merchandising and inventory checks.
- Stay informed about product specifications, pricing, and promotions to provide confident, up-to-date guidance to customers.
- Follow up with customers after purchase to confirm satisfaction, address questions, and encourage repeat business.
- Work toward individual and team sales targets, accurately reporting daily and weekly sales activities to management.
- Resolve customer inquiries and complaints with calm, solution-focused communication, escalating complex issues when necessary.
- Collaborate with colleagues, share product feedback, and participate in training to continuously improve service quality.
